body.name: Dr. Bronner's - Organic Shaving Soap (Unscented, 7 Ounce) - Certified Organic, Sugar and Shikakai Powder, Soothes and Moisturizes for Close Comfortable Shave, Use on Face, Underarms and Legs
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 18 hrs 15 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Fair for Life certifies for fair trade and more socially and environmentally responsible supply chains. MADE WITH FAIR TRADE INGREDIENTS Natrue certified cosmetics are made from naturally sourced ingredients. ORGANIC COSMETICS USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: USDA ORGANIC & FAIR TRADE INGREDIENTS: Fair trade & organic sugar combined with organic white grape juice keeps your skin nourished & moisturized. Organic coconut-olive-hemp oils blend for a creamy castile lather—our soapmaking tradition!

SHAVE, CLEANSE & HYDRATE ALL AT ONCE: Our shave gel is a multifunctional product—like most of our products. Cleanse as you shave and leave your skin moisturized! Use on your face, underarms & legs—for both men & women. All-One!

ORGANIC SHIKAKAI POWDER FOR SHAVING: Shikakai powder, derived from a tree pod, has long been used in traditional hair & body care in India. Shikakai hydrates & soothes dry skin while it cleanses. Great for shaving—so give your skin a treat!

ORGANIC & FAIR TRADE PALM KERNEL OIL: Grown by fairly-paid smallholder farmers in Ecuador to ensure sustainable harvesting techniques that won't damage local habitats—providing the smooth & creamy lather of our soaps while benefiting people & planet.

ORGANIC SUGAR IN OUR SHAVING GEL: Dr. Bronner's Shaving Soaps use fair trade & organic sugar from Brazil that keeps skin nourished, hydrated & smooth. It also gives our Organic Shaving Soaps their caramel color & sweet aroma.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Purest Organic Ingredients No synthetic preservatives, no detergents and no foaming agents—we use only the purest organic ingredients, most of them are also fair trade ingredients! We work with fair trade suppliers to implement regenerative organic farming practices that enrich soil, increase biodiversity and help combat climate change. Farm to shelf to shower, Dr. Bronner's is building trust, health, community, wealth! Fair prices-wages-conditions for farmers, suppliers—healthy ingredients and sustainable ingredients for you! Our Certifications Truth in Labeling! No greenwashing hype! Our products are verified to the strictest industry standards— most are certified to same organic standards as food! USDA Certified Organic to ensure no synthetic pesticides or fertilizers; Fair For Life fair trade certification to verify ethical working conditions & fair prices along our entire supply chain; most products Certified Vegan; Certified Leaping Bunny to verify that none of our ingredients or products are tested on animals; B Corp Certified to measure our social and environmental performance according to an independent third-party standard. Look for the logos! Give & give! We see our company as an engine to create positive change in the world, funding & fighting for the causes we believe in: regenerative agriculture, fair trade, wage equality, animal welfare—peace on Spaceship Earth! Dr. Bronner’s caps executive salaries at 5x that of our lowest-paid full-time employees, allowing us to share profits, share talent, share muscle, share voice—give & give, fund & fight for what’s right! Sustainability at Dr. Bronner's Our guiding principles: make humble and mindful use of the Earth’s gifts—what comes from the Earth must go back! Healthy soils, healthy farms and green factories make great soap! Dr. Bronner’s works with farmers to implement regenerative organic practices. Our coconut, palm and mint oil farms in Sri Lanka, Ghana and India sequestered ~16,000 MT of CO2 —removing greenhouse gases from the environment to help mitigate climate change. Our factory is powered by renewable energy and the soap we make is completely non-toxic, preservative free, detergent free and foaming agent free! All our cylinder soap bottles are made from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic. Let’s regenerate and heal earth! All-One!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: I bought this 5 months ago and literally just finished the bottle. So at first I wasn’t a fan and thought I was going to return it, but after giving it a few more tries I ended up loving it. I think that it must’ve been in a hot truck when it was delivered because the soap was so thin it was coming out as soon as I took off the lid. But after a few days it thickened up and it lathers very well. I also feel good knowing it has no bad chemicals in it. Next to no smell, if anything a little earthy. It does have that “dry squeaky skin” effect after using it but doesn’t last long. And again you only have to use a little bit and it goes a long way. I already bought my second bottle and will continue to use this. The only thing I would change is the bottle itself, I would prefer a pump for easier use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I usually shave with just water, and wanted to try a product without fragrance specifically for shaving, I got the closest shave with a cheap pink razor and this shaving soap! When I opened it I thought I was swindled or the product had expired because it came out as an oozing brown liquid. But I googled it, and that’s normal apparently. It does have a smell a bit like brown sugar, but it’s not overpowering after rinsing and it’s worth the best shave I’ve ever had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very liquidy but great for people who value non toxic products and it’s helpful for razor burn

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best shave soap
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin. Over the years I have tried many products and always seem to get razor burn. I started using this product a couple of years ago and it’s stuck. The consistency is a bit runny. But you learn that a little goes a long way. All my sensitive skin people out there. Give this a try. You won’t regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don't love it but I can't find a better option
reviews.reviewText: I started using this product as a shave gel because it is the only one I'm not allergic to. As other reviewers have mentioned, it is very watery and would be better with a pump. The bottle has some weird religious phrases that are off-putting and the fact that they are on a soap bottle makes me think the owners must be nuts because no marketing company advised this design. My guess is they know the product is too runny but it is the lack of ingredients that cause contact dermatitis that make it that way. I figure I have to chose between runny without rashes and thick cream with skin irritation. The smell isn't pleasant but isn't terrible. None of the products for skin sensitivities smell very good because they don't have added fragrance. On short trips where I need to minimize liquids in a carryon, this doubles as body wash and shave gel. I hope I find something better but for now this works because I don't get a rash or dry skin when I use this and I shave my legs every single day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Extremely disappointed and no returns allowed
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin, so finding something to shave comfortably with is never easy for me, but I am always looking for something new. After reading all the good reviews of this product, I ordered it with high expectations. But I’ve only shaved for the first time this morning since receiving this last week, and it was BRUTAL.My razor pulled my hair in a painful way and I was not able to get a close shave like I need without passing over multiple times, leading to me having an embarrassingly red face as I prepare to go to work this morning.Also, the consistency is basically that of a slightly thinner maple syrup: just not good for shaving, not for me anyway. And it’s supposed to be scent-free, but this is not the case. The sticky, syrupy soap has a distinct odor, and it is not good. Finally, the syrupy soap just got everywhere all over my bathroom sink, making a ridiculous sticky mess everywhere that required much clean up my once I had finished shaving, painfully. Just an overall very unpleasant shaving experience.But the real kicker is this: the shave soap is “not returnable” even though it is not listed in the seller’s list of “unreturnable” items anywhere! So I am stuck with this bad (at least bad for me) product and have no ability to get my money back. This kind of policy is really just absurd in this age of digital commerce. It wasn’t expensive, but that isn’t the point: if your customers genuinely dislike your product, online merchants have a responsibility to make it right and not stick their customers with products they greatly dislike.So beware: returning items and getting refunded by this seller is basically impossible, even when the particular item you buy is distinctly NOT on their ridiculous list of “nonreturnable items.”What is this seller thinking? Not the way you cultivate brand loyalty by sticking customers with items that do not at all work for them and that actually was painful to use. Very few merchants on Amazon are so short-sighted as to refuse returns and refunds for their products: but this outfit is apparently a very unfortunate exception.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have read a few bad reviews complaining about the consistency of this shaving cream., and how it is too runny. Quite simply, you have to know how much to use (which is a very small amount each time), and how to apply it (very thinly). I have been using it for a week now, and I can already see the difference. I shave my head, so need something that does not clog my pores. I can already see a huge improvement in my complexion.

I got this product because I was tired of using product with chemicals that didn't show any results. I love that this product uses organic ingredients that help hydrate your skin without irritating it with chemical fragrances. The smell is pleasant without being overpowering and the consistency is like any other soap. The color is a medium/dark brown which seems strange, but once you read the description it makes sense so don't be surprised by the color! The product left my skin feeling great and made for a smooth shave. Overall, a great organic alternative to regular shaving cream!
Works great 👍 it is runny so dont open it facing down . Foams great! Love it

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent : très bonne odeur, facilite vraiment le rasage
reviews.reviewText: J'ai commandé et reçu pour la première fois ce savon de rasage. Il est excellent. IL sent très bon, est biologique donc sans produit nocif et il facilite vraiment le rasage. J'ai la peau très sensible et de même que pour le savon de Castille de cette marque je suis très très satisfait.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 14, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: A great shave, packaging needs a correction
reviews.reviewText: This is a really good shaving soap. Smooth, pleasant natural fragrance - all great. I noticed that many buyers complain about the container not well suited to the consistency of the soap. Same here. But I did something about it - see the photo - this works a treat, and perhaps the manufacturer will take this as a hint :-)
Good product, very smooth after shaving
